Restart aText with Administrator privileges.

Adjust system settings to allow code injection into Windows Remote Assistant:
1. Open System Settings.
2. Find and open Exploit protection settings, or navigate Update & Security → Windows Security → App & browser control → Exploit protection settings.
3. Open Program settings.
4. Add program to customize.
5. Enter program name: msra.exe
6. Find Disable extension points.
7. Choose Override system settings and Off.
8. Apply.
